definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
passed on from generation to generation (idiom); to hand down

sentences.english: Based on what you know, which Next Gen Console will you buy?
sentences.chinese: 根据你现在所知，你会购买那一部次世代主机？

sentences.english: Politically, governments cannot afford not to invest in the skills of future generations, says Perera of UNESCO.
sentences.chinese: 在政治上，政府也不能不管未来世代的技能投资。

sentences.english: Will you serve God's purpose in your generation?
sentences.chinese: 你愿意在你的世代服事神的旨意吗？

sentences.english: It has sustained them for generations, providing everything they need to survive.
sentences.chinese: 祂世世代代养活着他们，赐予他们生存所必须的一切。

sentences.english: Following the sea is the tradition of his family.
sentences.chinese: 当海员是他家世代相传的职业。

sentences.english: The Pariahs were a specific caste whose hereditary job it was to act as the drummer in those festivals.
sentences.chinese: 帕利亚阶层的人世世代代都在那些节日里担任鼓手。
世代交替的甜蜜，是否遭背叛？

sentences.english: The accession of the Roman Church to power marked the beginning of the Dark Ages.
sentences.chinese: 在罗马教开始掌权的时候，也就是黑暗世代的开始。

sentences.english: Nonuse values include the existence value and benefit to future generations.
sentences.chinese: 非利用价值包括生存价值和给未来世代的利益。

sentences.english: Integrates a next-generation ICMS to ensure stability during loading and gameplay.
sentences.chinese: 整合次世代的ICMS保证游戏稳定度。

sentences.english: For a generation of chu"s will."
We are leaving a perpetual gift to generations of children to come.
sentences.chinese: 我们会为未来世世代代的儿童留下一份永久的礼物。

sentences.english: The Mayers have been distinguished doctors for generations. It runs in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 迈耶一家世代名医，从医是他们的祖传。

sentences.english: He proposes a quiz to tell whether you are a member
sentences.chinese: 他提出一个测试题，来验证你是否是X世代的一员。

sentences.english: Chinese fishing boats in nansha islands vie throughout your generations of waters homework.
sentences.chinese: 中国渔船世世代代在南沙群岛万安滩海域作业。

sentences.english: What’s kept them prideful and strong all these generations?
sentences.chinese: 他们凭什么世世代代保持了自己的尊严和兴旺呢？

definition: from generation to generation/generation after generation
passed on from generation to generation (idiom); to hand down
passed on from generation to generation (idiom); to hand down
